flawed_nl_solution:
Billy has already run 11 miles because 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus 1 plus plus 1 equals 11
Tiffany has already run 7 miles because 2 plus 2 plus 2 plus 1/3 plus 1/3 plus 1/3 equals <<2+2+2+1/3+1/3+1/3=7>>7
Billy has to run -4 mile to tie Tiffany because 7 minus 11 equals -4.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 11. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
